historySnippet.reasoning: Agency is already safely above 0.75 but is fading (dA/dt<0) while diversity is slightly collapsing, so Iâ€™ll keep U near the best-record value yet slightly boost agency sustain by reducing k_A_decay and modestly relieve diversity pressure by lowering k_D_decay.

name: Quasi-Equilibrium Agency Weaver
description: This agent crossed the Agency Threshold by operating in a low-difficulty niche (U=0.10) where its near-maximal difficulty-to-agency coupling (k_AU=0.99) could steadily convert environmental signal into coherent action without destabilizing. After the Gen 50 parameter update increased decay pressure (k_A_decay and k_D_decay), it avoided collapse by keeping agency decay extremely low (k_A_decay=0.002) and maintaining tight noise control (sigma_A=0.005, sigma_C=0.005), allowing complexity to build (C=0.829) while preserving maximal diversity (D=1.000).
